<RESUME_START>
EXPERIENCED INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY MANAGER

EXPERIENCE

Experienced Information Technology Manager
Highly accomplished professional with over 10 years of experience in a variety of management areas.
Astute in identifying operational business needs, turning needs into requirements, and producing supporting business and reporting systems.
Skilled in all phases of project management, managing resources and personnel, and leadership.
Demonstrated ability to implement effective systems and manage high output work teams.
Key Proficiencies Personnel Management Leadership Management of on-shore/off-shore resources Financial budgets/planning Project Management Business Intelligence Communications Business Analysis Report Development/ Analysis User Relations/User Training Development Superior Microsoft Office Product Knowledge Redesign of entire BI Program including streamlining of platform, redesign of warehouse, and revamp of reporting tools, resulting in consistent data across entire organization, quality, trusted data for business decision making, and license cost savings of $30,000 per year over 5 year period.
Redeployment of architecture of Business Objects to SAP BO with SAP BW providing backend closed system between tools to improve report design and runtime efficiency of reports.
Implementation of revamped external website using SharePoint as the redesign toolset; project brought our technology current to SharePoint 2010 architecture providing vendor support and established new company branding.
Redesign of SharePoint end user experience to gain user acceptance and build stronger partnership with business units.
Applications Team Leader

05/2012 to Current
Company Name

State
Manager of Business Intelligence, DBA, SharePoint, and Web departments; including strategic planning, overall systems architecture, and personnel.

Cultivate relationships with all levels within the organization to build strong partnerships.
Review reporting, database, SharePoint, and web practices to ensure proper techniques utilized, handle all project management, and oversee departmental staff development, compensation, and hiring practices.
Management of personnel includes both onshore and offshore consultants as well as company employees.
Accomplishments Implementation of revamped external website using SharePoint as the redesign toolset; managed on-time and within budget.
Project brought our technology current and provided a more streamlined user experience.
Redevelopment of standards for SharePoint governance; managed on-time.
Implementing governance allowed us to save over 100GB of server space and positioned our site for new branding.
Redesign of entire BI structure including platform, databases and reporting; currently on-going; managing and providing technical assistance.
Project brings disparate data sources together, combines tools into one system and saves licensing costs of $30,000 per year over 5 years.

Performed data analysis, management of reporting software systems and data warehouse environment, reviewed reporting practices to ensure proper techniques utilized, handled all project management, and oversaw departmental budget and staff development, compensation, and hiring practices.
Accomplishments Upgrade of the Business Objects architecture from unsupported version to latest copy.
Done on-time and within budget.
Managed project as well as did technical work.

Managed Help Desk personnel.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Manager, Business Systems Analysis, Spectrum Enterprise

Location: San Antonio, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
Do you want to guide a team to evaluate and develop cost-effective systems and procedures? You can do that. Ready to provide technical and strategic direction to boundary partners to identify issues and opportunities? As a Manager of Business Systems Analysis at Spectrum Enterprise, you can do that.

Spectrum Enterprise provides modern enterprise technology solutions that meet the unique needs of some of the country’s biggest brands. If you’re looking to build your most successful career, support client growth and work alongside intelligent, driven professionals, you can do that. We're ready to go all in on your future and create an engaging environment.

BE PART OF THE CONNECTION:

You identify, evaluate and develop cost-effective systems and procedures that meet user requirements. You select, lead and develop a team of technical experts to complete system enhancements that improve productivity while reducing costs. You understand how to tell a story using data. You align all developed policies and procedures to support the corporate vision. You collaborate with teams in person and digitally within an office environment.

HOW YOU CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE:

Lead data quality initiatives that analyze complex business issues and recommends systems and process enhancements that ensure data integrity across multiple systems.Create processes and routines to calibrate results and independently verify accuracy of data across systemsDevelop data management and data governance best practices to document the source of record and how to address data conflictsProvide expertise and select subject matter experts to identify, interpret and provide solutions on complex data integrity issues.Manage and develop a team of analysts.Mitigate risks and improve efficiencies by evaluating new applications and identifying systems requirements that can improve and automate data validation.Prepare communications and facilitate presentations to inform teams and leadership on process and system enhancements.

What You Bring To Spectrum Enterprise

Required qualifications:

Experience: Two or more years of management experience; Salesforce and billing (ICOMS preferably) knowledge.Education: Bachelor’s degree in a related field or equivalent experience.Technical skills: Expert knowledge of our business and systems; Proficient in Microsoft Office; Experienced in managing data and mapping data flow across multiple systemsSkills: Leadership, prioritization, organizational, presentation and English communication skills.Abilities: Ability to lead multiple parallel 

Preferred qualifications:

Enterprise products and systems knowledgeKnowledge of the telecommunications industry preferably in cableKnowledge / expertise in reporting tools including SQL, Teradata, MicroStrategyFamiliarity with Salesforce data management tools such as data loader and data import wizard

What you can enjoy every day:

Embracing diversity: A culture of excellence that celebrates diversity, innovative thinking and dedication to exceeding client expectations. Learning culture: Company support in obtaining technical certifications. Dynamic growth: Paid training and clearly defined paths to advance within the company. Total rewards: Comprehensive benefits that encourage a work-life balance. 

Apply now, connect a friend to this opportunity or sign up for job alerts.

BSY510 2024-30172 2024

Here, employees don’t just have jobs, they build careers. That’s why we believe in offering a comprehensive pay and benefits package that rewards employees for their contributions to our success, supports all aspects of their well-being, and delivers real value at every stage of life.

A qualified applicant’s criminal history, if any, will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable laws, including local ordinances.

Get to Know Us Charter Communications is known in the United States by our Spectrum brands, including: Spectrum Internet®, TV, Mobile and Voice, Spectrum Networks, Spectrum Enterprise and Spectrum Reach. When you join us, you’re joining a strong community of more than 100,000 individuals working together to serve more than 32 million customers in 41 states and keep them connected to what matters most. Watch this video to learn more.

Who You Are Matters Here We’re committed to growing a workforce that reflects our communities, and providing equal opportunities for employment and advancement. EOE, including disability/vets. Learn about our inclusive culture.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
